title: Nihonio's Artpage
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]
[[div style="display: none;"]]
[[include component:image-block name=https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/nihonio-s-artpage/nihorang|caption=for crom]]
[[/div]]

Heya! I'm Nihonio, an Argentinean artist, joined the page around two years ago and have been around since. I don't have a lot to say, these are some of the drawings I've made the time hanging here.

You can contact me over **[https://twitter.com/unbihexio Twitter]** or here about anything but tbh don't really expect a quick answer.
----
